description: Meadow Estates~ move in confidently! Roof, windows, pex, siding, balconies & fencing are done in this great complex. This spacious 1568 sq ft home is freshly painted, has a new H/W/T & is move in ready! Main flr offers a spacious primary suite with 2 pc ensuite, walk in closet & balcony with peek a boo mountain view. Living rm/dining area is open, has lots of windows making it nice & bright! Step out to the sun drenched upper balcony for your morning coffee. Kitchen offers loads of cabinetry & a 'pass through' to dining area. Up has 2 well sized bdrms, & 5 pc main bath. Huge rec rm down that could be 4th bdrm & leads to massive patio & private yard. A/C is great for the hot summers. Shopping, schools, all amenities right outside your door & the west coast express is perfect for commuters.
